summary:
SDE, Ambivert, Eternally curious.

When I was 7 years old, I saw my grandfather access some old accounts and I couldn't take my eyes off the screen. As a child, I was fascinated by the idea of computers. That fascination latched onto something more fundamental, the idea of implementing a vision virtually. That was the moment that shaped the rest of my life. 

I have always enjoyed learning and the best part of learning is the understanding of where and why that learning can be applied. I take comfort in creating things and watching them work.

And here is the concise version of the rest of my profile:

• Working as a Software Automation Developer at AlignX AI for the AIM Team.
• Worked as a Java Developer at Fannie Mae for the Chassis Team.
• Working as a Software Developer for DevAppsIT LLC, leveraging a comprehensive suite of technologies to deliver high-performance software systems tailored to client needs. 
• Worked as a Software Development Engineer at Amazon Web Services for the AWS Investments Team.
• Worked as a Software Developer for Indus Valley Consultants on a microservices project for the Erudex team.
• Graduate student at Texas Tech University
• Worked as a Software Engineer Intern at SenecaGlobal Pvt Ltd
• Graduate Student Assistant at the Texas Tech University
• Teaching Assistant at JNTU
• Skill Set - Python, Java, SQL (MySQL, SQLYog, SQLite), Figma, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, MongoDB, J2EE, Apache, Angular, Express, React, Node JS, XML, ProcessingJs, Spring Framework, Redux, Amazon Web Services, Git, NoSQL, Google Web Toolkit, Google Cloud Platform, Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, ElasticSearch, StateMachine, SNS, SQS, Agile methodologies, REST APIs, HTTP APIs, Gradle, Maven, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, UCD, SonarQube, GitLab, BitBucket, Dynatrace, Jira, Kanban, Confluence, Kafka, Kinesis, IBM MQ, Redis
headline: Software Development Engineer | Ex-Amazon

educations.description: Reinforcement Learning, Human-Computer Interaction, Intelligent Systems, Theory of Automata, Information Retrieval, Analysis of Algorithms, Advanced Algorithms, Advanced Operating Systems Design.
educations.activities:
An active member of the Indian Student Association (ISA).
An active member of Google DSC (Developer Student Club) at TTU.

educations.description: Algorithms & Data Structures, Object-Oriented Programming, Operating Systems, Web Development, Software Engineering, Computer Architecture, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing, Data Warehousing, Database Management Systems.
educations.activities: Technical event organizer and Coordinator, Throwball.

High School Diploma - Central Board of Secondary Education
educations.description: English, Mathematics, History, Civics, Geography, Economics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Computer Basics.
educations.activities:
Vice-Captain of the C. V. Raman house.
Organized Telugu Day and Exhibition.
Tennis, Basketball, Swimming, Theatre - Drama, Dance, Choir.

position.title: Software Automation Developer
position.description:
AlignX, an AI governance and compliance platform that helps organizations manage AI responsibly. It centralizes AI oversight, ensuring compliance with regulations like the EU AI Act and NIST AI RMF.
The platform offers AI project tracking, compliance monitoring, training data governance, and automated AI/ML scanning. It also includes user management, agent monitoring, prompt management, and advanced reporting dashboards.

- Develop and maintain a NextJS-based front-end web application with a strong focus on user experience, performance, and responsiveness.
- Design and implement an API Gateway using AWS API gateway to handle routing, load balancing, and security for backend services. 
- Develop and maintain high-performance APIs using FastAPI, ensuring scalability and efficiency with async capabilities. 
- Integrated and managed an Identity and Access Management system (Keycloak) for user authentication, authorization, and single sign-on (SSO). 
- Participate in the CI/CD pipeline setup and deployment process to ensure rapid development cycles.
- Develop and execute test plans to ensure software quality, covering unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
- Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks and troubleshoot production issues to enhance application stability and reliability.

position.title: Software Developer
position.description:
I specialize in crafting robust, scalable applications that drive business success through innovative technology solutions. My role involves leveraging a comprehensive suite of technologies to deliver high-performance software systems tailored to client needs.

Key Technologies and Skills:
- Java: Expertise in developing and optimizing Java applications.
- Spring Framework: Proficient in using Spring Boot for building microservices architectures and managing RESTful APIs.
- Hibernate: Experience in ORM for data persistence and transaction management.
- Full-Stack Development: Skilled in integrating backend services with dynamic, responsive front-end interfaces.
- Angular: Developing modern Single Page Applications (SPAs) with Angular up to version 17.
- Kubernetes & Docker: Deploying containerized applications, managing CI/CD pipelines, and optimizing resource use for scalability and resilience.
- Cloud Platforms: Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for cloud-native deployments and data processing.
- Best Practices: Implementing software design principles, ensuring secure, maintainable, and high-quality code.

I am committed to continuous learning, staying abreast of industry trends, and applying innovative solutions to enhance software performance and security. My collaborative approach and dedication to high standards ensure the delivery of successful, impactful software solutions.

position.title: Java Developer
position.description:
- Built and maintained components for internal framework to support proprietary customer use cases
- Setup continuous integration with Jenkins and make use of a wide range of plugins available to set up smooth developer-friendly workflows
- Made use of gradle and maven for building applications and written structured pom which can be consumed by Jenkins
- Set up code coverage using Jacoco and SonarQube
- Provided continuous testing with Selenium testing which involves end-to-end, api and ui frameworks
- Setup SonarQube projects which correspond to Bit Bucket projects and provide code analysis of different programming standards 
- Have built Docker images and written Docker files which were used to automate all developer tasks
- Develop the functionalities using Agile Scrum methodology.
- Created reusable modules and custom directives in Angular 2.0 which were available to be consumed by customers.
- Migrated internal framework from Java 8 to Java 17 and redeployed sample applications to account for the differences.
- Implemented RESTful web services to retrieve data from the client side made REST API calls from Angular JS parsed the data to project to the client and handled the security and authorization using Spring Security and OAuth 2.0.

position.title: Software Development Engineer
position.description:
● Designed and implemented various microservices to facilitate the data management for AWS pricing and promotions with Salesforce as a system or record.  The server salesforce data model was built using several standard and custom Salesforce objects. Implemented several RESTful connectors with various AWS services to fetch and synchronize the metadata required for calculating and updating pricing, promotions, and discounts.
● Conceptualized and executed the design of HTTP APIs, thereby facilitating a seamless integration framework connecting web applications and backend systems. Pioneered the development of a microservice designed to manage, execute, and perpetuate a schedule of promotion disbursements. This feat was achieved through a skillful orchestration of EventBridge, Statemachines, Step functions, DynamoDB, and SQS queues. A concurrent microservice was engineered to apprise end customers of schedule progress using SES notifications.
● Optimized database queries and improved system efficiency through performance tuning and code refactoring.
● Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze user requirements, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
● Actively participated in Agile methodologies, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
● Led a team of developers in designing and building a scalable and secure feature using AWS services such as Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon S3, and Amazon Lambda

position.title: Software Developer
position.description:
- Successfully designed and implemented Microservices Architecture, improving system scalability and maintainability.
- Orchestrated containerized applications using Docker and managed deployments with Kubernetes.
- Developed secure RESTful APIs with Spring Boot, implementing JWT for enhanced authentication.
- Established effective CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, ensuring seamless integration and deployment processes.
- Implemented responsive design with various front-end technologies, providing an optimal user experience.
- Enhanced monitoring and logging systems, integrating ELK Stack and Prometheus/Grafana for comprehensive visibility.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams, utilizing Agile methodologies to meet project milestones efficiently.

Skillset: 
Programming Languages: Java
Microservices Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Cloud
Containerization and Orchestration: Docker, Kubernetes
API Gateway: Netflix OSS (Zuul), Eureka
Message Brokers: Kafka, RabbitMQ
Databases: SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL), NoSQL (MongoDB)
Version Control: Git
Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Jenkins, GitLab CI, Travis CI
Front-end Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (React, Angular, Vue.js)
Responsive Design Frameworks: Bootstrap, Materialize CSS, Foundation
RESTful APIs: Java Spring Boot
Containerization and Orchestration: Docker, Kubernetes
Testing: JUnit, TestNG, Postman, Insomnia
Monitoring and Logging: ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), Prometheus, Grafana
Security: Spring Security, JWT (JSON Web Tokens)
Project Management: Jira, Trello, Asana
Collaboration Platforms: Slack, Microsoft Teams, Confluence
Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud
Agile Methodologies: Scrum, Kanban
Code Review Tools: Bitbucket, GitHub

position.title: Teaching Assistant
position.description:
• Instructed concepts of Web Programming and Software Engineering, graded assignments, and evaluated projects.
• Reviewed and graded the major projects of 60 students and helped with their system design.

position.title: Software Engineer Intern
position.description:
- The project, named "Library Management System," aimed to enhance the performance and efficiency of cataloging and managing library resources.
- The primary goal of the optimization initiative was to streamline the functionality of the Library Management System, ensuring faster and more responsive operations.
- The system facilitated the cataloging of diverse library resources, including books, journals, and multimedia materials.
- Efficiently managed resource data, allowing for easy retrieval, tracking, and updating of library holdings.
- Leveraged JavaScript to enhance the interactivity and responsiveness of the user interface.
- Utilized JDBC/ODBC connectors to establish seamless communication between the Java application and the Oracle Database.
- Implemented HTML and CSS for an intuitive and visually appealing front-end design.
- Employed SQL queries to optimize database interactions, ensuring quick and accurate retrieval of information.
- Fine-tuned database queries to minimize response times and enhance overall system performance.
- Improved the user experience by optimizing the presentation layer with HTML and CSS.
- Enabled users to navigate the system effortlessly and perform cataloging and resource management tasks efficiently.
- The optimized Library Management System delivered a more responsive and user-friendly experience, significantly reducing the time required for cataloging and resource retrieval.
- Showcased proficiency in Java programming using Eclipse IDE.
- Demonstrated expertise in database management with Oracle.
- Applied front-end development skills with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
- Leveraged JDBC/ODBC connectors for efficient database connectivity.
- Applied SQL for optimizing database queries.
- The optimized system not only enhanced performance but also contributed to the overall efficiency of library operations, providing a reliable and streamlined resource management solution.

certifications.name: Advanced SQL for Query Tuning and Performance Optimization
NLP with Python for Machine Learning Essential Training
Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization

items.title: 2020: Survival
items.description: • Developed a VR game designed to spread awareness on COVID Health Guidelines in younger kids. • Led a team of 4 people to develop and deploy a multilevel game. • Worked with Unity 3D, Mapbox, Blender, GitHub and C#.

items.title: Augmented Reality (AR) shooting game
items.description:
•	Developed and deployed a shooting game on Augmented Reality
•	The skillset used in this project is Git, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, A-Frame, JQuery, Bootstrap, CreateJs

Shooting game based on Augmented Reality
1) From the markers' position of A and B, zombies are spawned and run towards the middle marker to attack.
2) The target is in the middle of the screen. To protect our space, the user fights back the zombie by direct the target towards the zombies.
3) For each dead zombie, the score increases by 1.
4) Spawn more zombies by button Play

items.title: Bipedal Model
items.description:
•	Used DDPG algorithm and MuJoCo - Humanoid to model and train a Bipedal Model to walk autonomously learning from its surroundings using Reinforcement Learning
•	The model could maintain balance and walk irrespective of the terrain and its obstacles

items.title: SmartReflection - Team Lead
items.description:
•	Used processing to develop a Smart Mirror with personalization
•	The skillset used in this project is HTML, P5, CSS, JavaScript, Git

The features are as follows:
-> There is a feature in our mirror that will let you know if you have spent more than an hour in front of the mirror.
-> Displays time and date
-> Shows the weather and temperature information of the region
-> Allows users to play music on Spotify
-> Displays personalized calendar events
-> We have options to sync the mirror to your phone and connect to WiFi
-> There are Day Mode and Night Mode to the mirror that adjusts the light of the mirror according to the time of the day
-> The mirror lets you access your social media and newsfeed
-> It has settings and widgets options to let you customize your mirror
-> There is an option called moods that would play a specific playlist to suit your mood

items.title: Intrusion Detection using Machine Learning Algorithms - Team Lead
items.description:
•	Compared the performance of 3 machine learning classifiers on various datasets
•	Optimized the best performing classifier for intrusion detection on a network
•	Worked on/with Python 3 as a programming language, Jupyter Notebook as a platform, and various Datasets
•	The Algorithms used in the project are Support Vector Machine, Random Forest, and Extreme Learning Machine

items.title: Digital Certificate Storage - Team Lead
items.description:
•	I have used Eclipse IDE (Java) and Oracle DataBase to generated authenticated certificates for students of a registered college
•	The skill set used for this project is JavaScript, Bootstrap, SQL, HTML, CSS, Java, Spring Framework MVC

items.title: Grocery List - Team Lead
items.description:
•	Used voice commands and speech-to-text mechanisms to develop an Alexa Skill on AWS that creates, updates, and deletes Grocery Lists using voice as an interface
•	The skill set used in this project is AWS, Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) Evaluation tool, Java, and AWS Lambda
•	Led a team of 4 people into securing 4th place in a nation-wide hackathon called Alexathon

items.title: Library Management System - Intern
items.description:
•	I used Eclipse IDE (Java) and Oracle Database to optimize a project called “Library Management System”, which cataloged and managed library resources, for performance
•	The skillset I used was; JavaScript, JDBC/ODBC connectors, HTML, CSS and SQL
